TELEMETRY REF CS_RECORDMISMATCH BIG_ENDIAN "Number of records in header doesn't match number in file"

    APPEND_ITEM SYNC 72 STRING "Sync pattern"  
    APPEND_ITEM LENGTH 32 UINT "Telemetry length"
    APPEND_ID_ITEM DESC 32 UINT 2 "Descriptor always 2 for EVR's"  
    APPEND_ID_ITEM EVR_ID 32 UINT 553 "EVR ID"
    APPEND_ITEM HDR_TIME_BASE 16 UINT "Time Base"
    APPEND_ITEM TIME_CONTEXT 8 UINT "Time Context"
    APPEND_ITEM SECS 32 UINT "Seconds"
    APPEND_ITEM USECS 32 UINT "Microseconds"

    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME 0 STRING "The name of the sequence file"
    ITEM HEADER_RECORDS -64 32 UINT "The number of records in the header"
    ITEM EXTRA_BYTES -32 32 UINT "The number of bytes beyond last record"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Sequence file %s header records mismatch: %d in header, found %d extra bytes." , packet.read('fileName') , packet.read('header_records') , packet.read('extra_bytes') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
      META FORMAT_STRING "Sequence file %s header records mismatch: %d in header, found %d extra bytes."
      META ARGS fileName header_records extra_bytes 
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('WARNING_HI')
